- Some minor improvements made to the Send Money screen providing you a smoother overall experience.

- You can now send payments to China! We’re just as excited as you are. Go ahead and start sending money further East within just 1 day.
- Your Refer a Friend program is changing. Now, both you and the friend you refer will get a reward when they transfer at least £50, or equivalent in another currency.

- You can now send payments to China! We’re just as excited as you are. Go ahead and start sending money further East within just 1 day.
- Your Refer a Friend program is changing. Now, both you and the friend you refer will get a reward when they transfer at least £50, or equivalent in another currency.

Cryptocurrencies are coming soon! See real-time rates and join the queue to be first in line for our full crypto experience.

- You can now use your card to make payments from Romania and Hungary.
- Coming this month: Super fast transfers when sending from Romania or Hungary! Money received in just 30 minutes!

- You can now call and receive help in Ukrainian.
- Other small UI and usability fixes.

Unsure of your recipient’s bank details? Just enter the details you do know, such as name, country and email or phone number. We’ll send them a request to add their bank details and review their personal information, and then you can use this recipient. Secure and super fast.

- We have a new look! An easy to use and clear design for first time users when you’re completing your profile.
- You can now pre-fill your address by using your current location. Faster to save you time.
- Our Refer a Friend program is changing. To get your cash bonus, referred users now have to transfer £150 (or equivalent in other currencies). Check our Terms and Conditions for full changes.

- This month we’re enabling crypto for everyone! It's happening, stay tuned!
- Languages, limbi, języki, duujjil, языки, мови, sprachen, valodas, kalbos. Yes, they're finally coming to our mobile app and by the end of the year - the whole app will be translated in to our 9 languages.
- We've also crushed a bug, where some users couldn't login to our app. Now that’s a bummer.

- Buy and sell crypto! What are you waiting for - go go go!
We also:
- Made some nice changes for the first time users and improved recurring users’ experience.
- Fixed card payment issue if sending money to Romania or Hungary.

Check out new Passcode screen: it’s clean, it’s intuitive and we hope you will like it as much as we do.
And new Invite friends screen is waiting for you too! P.S. You can earn £10 for each friend you invite.

- Our document verification pages have had a serious update.
- We’ve also integrated Onfido to speed up the verification process. Now, you can join the gang and make online money transfers with a few clicks and a selfie!

We’ve promised more languages and we’re delivering! TransferGo app now speaks in:
- Polski
- Русский
- Türkçe
And even more languages are coming soon!

Another great news, soon you will be able to send money from Turkey!

This time it's all about small, but nice improvements!
• Now you can see your pending RaF claims.
• The exact delivery date is displayed for transfers which take over 1 day.
• Even better documents verification flow.
• More specific reasons for declined cards.
• Other nice UX improvements.

• Bug fixes and stability improvements.

- TransferGo now speaks Latvian. Yes, it means all 9 languages, limbi, języki, duujjil, языки, мови, sprachen, valodas, kalbos are finally here!
- Push notifications will now open on a relevant screen.
- We made transfer success screen to really look like a success!
- And, of course, lots of inner beauty changes.

• Now you can manage your bank cards in an easy and convenient way: add, scan and remove them at your will!
• It became much easier to claim your RAF bonuses. Just invite your friends and try it out!
• And, of course, various small but important improvements here and there.

This release is all about inner beauty. We have fixed numerous bugs and improved iOS 13 support, but unfortunately, we discontinue support of iOS 10. 
We hope your journey with TransferGo will be much smoother with this version! Aaaaand, for Lithuanian customers, we have updated our new local transfers feature. Check it out!
As always, thanks for using TransferGo!

TransferGo 4.1.0 is even more exciting than it sounds.
IT’LL MAKE YOU (a tiny bit) RICH(er)!
Now you can:
- Invite more friends to TransferGo, more easily
- Track your earnings on a dedicated page
- Get rich! Make your friends rich! Get more rich!
Plus lots of tiny little improvements that you won’t notice, but will make your experience a little bit better. Like the fairy that makes sure you can find your keys. Or the one that sweeps dog poo from your path. Enjoy.

Happy Update Day!
This is a great day for:
- People who like inviting friends and making money (cos now you can prompt friends, track progress and earn more easily)
- Users who want to sign in with Apple ID (cos now you can)
- Anyone who wants a smoother, faster app (cos this new release is smoother and, er, faster).
This is a bad day for:
- Bugs. A really bad day for you little fellas. Sorry (not sorry)

Introducing some teeny-weeny changes you won't notice, unless you're:
a) Sherlock Holmes, OR
b) one of the few people whose Apple Pay crashed, in which case you will TOTALLY LOVE THIS AMAZING UPDATE. Maybe.

’There’s always stuff to work on. You’re never there.’ - Tiger Woods.

We’ve been working on our stuff. Bug fixes, improvements, tweaks. ‘Cos Tiger's right, you're never there. And anyway, there hasn’t been much else to do…

We’ve been working on our stuff. Bug fixes, improvements, tweaks. ‘Cos Tiger's right, you're never there. And anyway, there hasn’t been much else to do…

’There’s always stuff to work on. You’re never there.’ - Tiger Woods.

We’ve been working on our stuff. Bug fixes, improvements, tweaks. ‘Cos Tiger's right, you're never there. And anyway, there hasn’t been much else to do…

You know when you go into a room, and make a bunch of important but tiny improvements—dust, fold some clothes, reframe a picture, air the room, clean under the bed—and no one notices?
That's what we've done here. Enjoy.

That's what we've done here. Enjoy.

That's what we've done here. Enjoy.

We all love a little laziness.
So we’ve made laziness easier, and fixed:
- the pre-fills on the quick booking feature
- the prefills when you’re sending money to yourself
- the weird jumpy Face ID glitch

Plus other little bug fixes that will smooth out the bumps in your day.
Enjoy.

TransferGo 4.1.7 (vroom) edition

Our app just keeps on getting faster. This latest whizzy release lets you log in faster—using only your phone number!

Also:
- Get Live Chat support in Polish
- Experience the hidden pleasures of countless unseen bug fixes
Enjoy!

If only you could update your home this easily. Press a button and all the bins get taken out, the washing up gets done, the windows are clean, stray socks find their partners, and the bathroom sparkles.
Plus your fridge gets an upgrade.
That’s what we’ve done to the technology that makes your app work. Enjoy!

If you're new, we've made your first transaction (even) easier.
If you keep uploading cat photos as proof of ID, we've made that a little harder.
And if you're sending from the Czech Republik, you can now choose CZK as the sending currency—which is just the start of much more easy stuff to come.
Plus loads of other fixes that make this the smoothest, most stable version yet. Enjoy!

TransferGo 4.7.0

Consider the thumb. We do. It goes on a journey every time you use an app.
So we’ve been making sure your thumb has an easier ride (or whichever finger you use, we don’t discriminate). Smoothing the surface. Taking out the bumps.

Basically: more waterslide, less obstacle course.

Thumbs up for 4.7.0!

What’s new:
Slicker referral screens
Marketing opt ins clearer
Clearer validation for pay-in cards
Bug fixes and minor tweaks

TransferGo 4.8.1

Smooth like a toboggan run. Smooth like a face in a 5-blade razor advert. Smooth like the gravelly voice of a jazz singer with even more wisdom than belly. Smooth like an elevator ride to the top of a skyscraper with zero stops along the way. Smooth like that time you got the paper in the bin from 8 yards and everyone was watching.

Welcome to TransferGo 4.8.1: The Smooth Edition.
Enjoy!

What’s new:
- More 2-Factor Authentication options
- Clearer, up-front ID requirements
- Bug carnage

TransferGo 4.12.0: The Spring Clean edition

We’ve flung open the windows and given our app a tidy from top to bottom.

You’ll notice:
• Local transfers have their own flow. Try one!
• There are only three tabs at the bottom now
• You can invite friends from your Home screen

You won’t notice:
• Literally hundreds of minor in-app equivalents of donating old clothes, touching up the paintwork, airing the cupboards and building the shed…

We say you won’t notice them, but you’ll feel them. This is our neatest app ever.
Enjoy the sunshine.
